articles.author: Sean Endicott
articles.title: European Space Agency to upgrade Mars Express spacecraft from Windows 98 - Windows Central
articles.description: The Mars Express spacecraft has run on an OS based on Windows 98 for 19 years.
articles.content:
• The Mars Express spacecraft, which launched in 2003, will receive a software update to improve the data it sends back to Earth.

articles.title: Russian missiles hit Kyiv as G7 summit begins in Europe - CNN
articles.description: Russia targeted the Ukrainian capital of Kyiv with a series of missile attacks Sunday, as leaders of the G7 nations gather in Germany for the first day of their annual summit.
articles.content:

articles.title: Ukraine: Russia strikes Kyiv as G7 leaders meet - CTV News
articles.description: Russia shattered weeks of relative calm in the Ukrainian capital with long-range missiles fired toward Kyiv early Sunday, an apparent Kremlin show-of-force as Western leaders meet in Europe to strengthen their military and economic support of Ukraine.
